questions.describe:
Which is a custom object relationship type?
*Choose 2 answers*
Where are the field level security settings located?

Which are affected by changing the organization locale setting?
*Choose 2 answers*
An administrator may create a lookup relationship between all of the following EXCEPT

answerOptions.describe: From a custom object to itself
From a custom to a standard object
From a standard to a custom object
From the user object to a custom object

questions.describe: Which statement is true when a label on a standard object, such as "Accounts," is renamed?

answerOptions.describe: Online help can be modified to reflect the new name
Pages in the setup area will still use the default, original labels
The API name for the field will also change
The field will no longer appear to users until is enabled, with the new name, in the page layout.

questions.describe: What does the primary object in a custom report type determine?

answerOptions.describe: Whether or not the report is sortable
The type of report that can be built
Whether or not the report can be used as source for a dashboard
The options available in the View pick list when running a report

questions.describe:
What are default values for an opportunity record created upon lead conversion?
year.

answerOptions.describe: It is not possible to set any default values for a new opportunity
Only the name of the opportunity and account filled in from the lead conversion page
The opportunity and account name, including the close date defaulting to the end of the
The opportunity and account name, including the close date defaulting to the last day of the quarter and Stage field defaulting to the first value

questions.describe: What can be done with a workflow task that cannot be done with a workflow alert?

Which feature can be used to send sales management an email alert when a sales representative qualifies a large deal?
*Choose 2 answers*
What is required before an organization can be enabled for territory management?

answerOptions.describe: At least one account sharing rule

What must an administrator do to schedule and email reports?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Specify the report location in a personal folder
Specify a link to the reports

questions.describe:
Which object is a standard object?
*Choose 3 answers *
Person accounts and business accounts can be accessed via Accounts tab. To create a view that only displays person accounts, you must

answerOptions.describe: Filter based on the field "Is Person Account"
Add the contract related list to the account page layout
Select the "View All Data" permission on the user profile
Set the access for the contact object to "Controlled by Parent"
